name: Sea Barrio
description:
An hermit living in the middle of the ocean suddenly sees himself in a curious situation! Build a small sea town and help the villagers settle on this small but beautiful paradise!

Challenges!
Spanglish - Spanglish dialogue.
Oye mi Canto - Inspired by Son Cubano and Son Guatemalteco.

How to play:
Move with:
   W  
 A S D
Jump  J
Build/Saw  B
Interact I
Fishing spacebar

This is me Entry for Unidos 2022!
Game by  @Quijipixel (dev, art, music, sfx and game design)
Fonts by @somepex
